ComicInfo.Series: The Old Guard: Tales Through Time
ComicInfo.Summary:
Watch the smash-hit Netflix movie starring Charlize Theron! KELLY SUE DeCONNICK and VALENTINE DE LANDRO (BITCH PLANET) take the immortal warriors to feudal Japan! Plus, ERIC TRAUTMANN (LAZARUS X +66, Checkmate) and MIKE HENDERSON (NAILBITER) plunge Booker in an Old West shootout with stakes that reverberate today!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|----------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Leandro Fernandez & Daniela Miwa | 1 | | B | Cover B | Valentine De Landro | 2 | | C | Cover C | Leandro Fernandez & Daniela Miwa | 3 |
Note: Andy only appears on a variant cover.
